name: PacMon
description:
You are the monster, go get all the Pacman!

This game is my 2 days work, for the Ludum Dare 33 compo. As the rules goes, the pack contends the source project that created in UE4.7.6

The theme of LD33 is "You are the monster", So I made a Pacman game, in which we control the monster, not the pacman. Although eating all the pacman is our goal, they can be aggressive when getting 1000 gems, so be careful! And don't forget you can also place roadblock to trap the pacman

WASD or arrow to move; space or Lmouse to place roadblock
